class.name: SshTunnel
class.description: A [build feature](https://github.com/Vampire/teamcity-ssh-tunnel) which opens an SSH tunnel with given forward during a build

function.name: sshTunnel
function.description: Adds a [build feature](https://github.com/Vampire/teamcity-ssh-tunnel) which opens an SSH tunnel with given forward during a build

param.name: sshTunnelRequirement
param.description: For TeamCity versions prior to 2019.1, this must be set to literally '%ssh.executable%', if it is not, it will be changed automatically. For later TeamCity versions this should be omitted.

param.name: name
param.description: The name for this forward, this is also used in the parameter names

param.name: connection
param.description: The connection properties for the carrier connection

param.name: teamcitySshKey
param.description: The SSH key to authenticate with

param.name: secure:teamcitySshKeyPassphrase
param.description: The passphrase for the SSH key to authenticate with

param.name: localPart
param.description: Either local address / port or local socket can be specified (default: 127.0.0.1:<random port>)

param.name: localAddress
param.description: The local address to bind to (default: 127.0.0.1)

param.name: localPort
param.description: The local port to forward (default: <random port>)

param.name: remotePart
param.description: Either remote address / port or remote socket must be specified

param.name: remoteAddress
param.description: The remote address to forward to (default: 127.0.0.1)

param.name: remotePort
param.description: The remote port to forward to

param.name: remoteSocket
param.description: The remote socket to forward to
